content.label: This is a great game. Please create more add-ons for this game. I’ve played the other ones they’re not as great. I know it is an old game. Nevertheless, it’s a great game.

In my opinion this is literally the best tablet game I have ever played unfortunately this game is better than galaxy on fire three and Galaxy on fire alliances I doubt they will ever come out with a better game than what they did and I really hope they don’t get rid of this we need to end up re-publishing it again but advertisements out and I guarantee you they will get even more money from us just to be able to keep the game act I feel bad that Galaxy on fire the first one Is gone now they got rid of it and I don’t even understand why they need to make a new galaxy on fire games that incorporates everything from this one and even further or make another DLC for this game and I guarantee you they will get a lot you guys please do not get rid of this game it is my favorite and I guarantee you it is many other people’s favorites

I know, it’s a pretty old game. But if you enjoy space, and a good rpg game then this is the one for you. I can’t say how many times I’ve come back to replay this game I love it so much I even bought it in Steam. The DLC’s are way worth the $9 to get both of them, and it’s best to get them sooner than later to get the items in the game. They also fixed the sound bugs ♥️♥️. Genuinely wish there were more games just like this out there

A friend of mine told me about this game a few years ago, and I just assumed it would be a good way to kill time. Boy was I wrong! This game is nothing short of amazing, one of the best mobile games out there. The free roam has plenty to do, the campaign is fun but short with an entertaining storyline and decent voice acting. The freelance missions are great, there’s good variety amongst them. All the different spacecraft, weapons, and equipment are cool (the Vossk ones have excellent names) and there are plenty to choose from. The gameplay is very good and the graphics are a lot better than I expected of an older game. The achievements are fun to work towards and you are rewarded for completion of them all. I do not have any of the DLC but I’ve seen gameplay videos of them and they look fantastic! Even the Supernova DLC demo (Supernova Challenge) is epic! I HIGHLY recommend this game to anyone and everyone looking for a fun, well crafted, AWESOME game to spend many hours on, and keep them entertained. Thank you Fishlabs for making this beautiful work of art.
-PowBasilisk, GOF2 player since 2018.
Had lots of fun playing this. Make more like it.
An engrossing and fun game. Looked up “Wing Commander” and this was one of the top returns. Fun and easy to play. Just an all around good game.
We want arabic language

title.label: This is the greatest game since Wing Commander

content.label:
Please make more expansions or release the tools so we can make them and pass them onto you.

Thank you for this game and the expansions, was truly fun.
I have been playing this for years. One of the best games offered on the App Store.

title.label: Great game but a update is much needed

content.label: I love this game but I think it’s time for a update with new content and a extended story mode

Honestly, this game is something that I’ve wanted to exist since I was a little kid playing Star Fox and wishing I could just travel around in my ship freely from planet to planet.  I’m only a week or two in but I have absolutely no criticism so far.  Great job.
I’ve been playing this game for YEARS and it’s still amazing!
I love the game spend a lot of time on it but I would like my friends to play with me on a multiplayer mode that would be a lot of fun and I hope you add that

I’ve played this through on different difficulty settings and always enjoyed it.  Now that we are staying home and social distancing, I’ve come back to it again, and it is still one of the best games out there.

Ahh, not like the days of waiting for the tape to “bzzz, kkhhh, phhhwwh” for 5 mins to then error out, but this brings back nostalgic memories of Elite, the first and best 3D space flight and mission game. Well put together. Would love additional challenges of options to manually have to dock, and for this to be a multiplayer game.

title.label: Bought 8 Years Ago - Never Played Until Today

content.label:
Yup, first time even opening this game was on  Saturday 3.27.2020 - I forgot I even owned and just saw it in my ‘Purchased Apps’ list. 

I thought I owned 4000 Apps, I guess it’s actually 4001. 😂
Such a great game I’ve beat the campaing and am still exploring even after that as it is just so fun, please though add an online multiplayer mode before I get bored of playing the campaing.

I just downloaded this game 3 days ago and managed to complete the storyline within 17.2 hr of game time. I certainly wasn’t racing to finish, and I didn’t spend a dime. The game itself is fantastic, but I couldn’t believe it was over so fast. They let you keep playing after the credits run, but what’s the point...

I cannot fine any game that comes near it. Graphics are outrageous, I would think there are more planets to discover.
So I will keep going, but it's been great. Maybe new ships. I love the game and there is not a game to come near it. Thank you so much.

title.label: Don’t let it Galaxies fire die out

content.label:
Developers of this treasure of a game, you have created something unique and fantastic but the bounds of game is boxed by the mobile device. If you continue this game on a console the graphics, story, ships ect. Would be boundless and would receive so much support don’t let a jewel of a game go unnoticed take it as far as you go. 
Please, and thank you

P.S. the mixture of freelance and story was the best, hope this helps you know that the game is more than you think, the whole idea is amazing it could be more than mobile! plus why was manticore so story heavy only freelance in it was pointless?
The game has good graphics and storyline. It is fun to play but it takes a long time to level up unless you spend $$$$.
Enjoy game, makes time fly. I play over and over again!!!!

title.label: The best game I ever played

content.label: I like this game a lot I think it is better the galaxy on fire 3.

This game is great, really. I have so much fun playing this game but I have one major issue with enemy AI
I really hate the fact that they target YOU out of a million fighters in the area, like when I see some pirates fighting so many other neutral/friendly fighters and they all turn and target me. It really gets on my nerves, if you can fix that I would find the game WAY more fun to play

It is like Hades Star, Atari Asteroids, Astronest, and Nova Empire all rolled in one and build upon the foundation of The Sims Immortal Game Platform. AMAZING Graphics, variety, story lines, activities, side adventures, and unique cargo strategy to unlock and unfold. You could really get lost (pun intended) in space playing this game. Bravo to the Game Developers for acclaiming what it means to play video games in the 2020 decade!

title.label: Great but you have to work hard

content.label: Great game but you will have to fail to win, it’s challenging but if you persist to resist then it will be a great game to keep playing

title.label: This should be the 1st sci-fi game not gof3

content.label:
Love this game so much which I played on different platforms for like 3 or 4 times. Normal and basic story in Nokia and blackberry, then Valkyrie on my android pad two years ago, which it had some bugs on the station explosion that do not let me continued. And thank god the bug got fixed when I played on the iPad Pro this year. By completing all the stories, the game really worth for every penny. For 50 hours, it’s awesome to review all the story after purchased all best ships in the stations. Although the graphic is not the same level as gof3, but hey it’s a game that I had played 6 or 7 years ago.
Thank you all those people who brought the game to us. It not only it’s a game for me, it’s also a valuable memory for all those kids that do not even understand why a bra flies on the galaxy lol. All your efforts worth these rewards and love. Appreciated for those who support the game for a long long time.
—— From a person who played the game from age 13-20
I don’t normally write reviews but this game is absolutely amazing and worth every penny for the add ons!
Hard to play on iPhone X due to screen cut off some of the words/ buttons or needs custom controls
I never write reviews - but i had to. This game does it all! No extra purchases, awesome epic game play, just the perfect space game in all ways (and tons better than GoF3...sorry guys). More please!

I got hooked on this game by my dad and have been playing it for years and it is still a great and entertaining game. No ads or bugging you to buy the extras and the graphics are amazing as is the storyline . The addition to the story is great and this is probably the best game I have ever played and I can’t stop. But one tiny thing. When I try to make a new save, it automatically deletes my old one. There are 9 slots available but I cannot use any. BUT WHAT REALLY MAKES ME MAD IS THAT YOU BLEW IT WITH GOF3!!! YOU HAD SUCH A GOOD THING GOING AND DECIDED TO MESS IT UP WITH GOF3! WHAT WERE YOU THINKING!?!?GOF1 And 2 are so good and you took all the good things and Said let’s throw em out the window! This is the reason why I give this game five stars but gof3 ZERO
This game is so good! I could do this in real life!
Very addictive

If you haven’t played this game go right ahead and try it. I’ve beaten the entire game and have earned everything and I still like to roam around from time to time. The only way that you could make a classic game like this a little better. Is add a multiplayer option. And open world player lobby. I feel that the ability to play online publicly, or in private sessions with friends. This game was worth every Penney in the add ons and I am no where near upset. I loved that I am able to play with absolutely no internet as well.
Love it. Played on and off for few years. Wish they would come up with next one as good like that   Thank you
It reminds me of the old pc game Privateer, but better! Enjoy
This game is amazing! Just finished the Supernova story, and it was AMAZING! Literally, nothing I’ve ever seen before! But I do wish there can be new story’s added.
I have play this games off and on for a long time. I have finish it once but really like the game it self being able to do what you want kind of.
Xbox one and PS4 controllers now work so it finally feels like a real fighter pilot game after so many years. It's worth the play.

I had not played in awhile the game has never been deleted. I was so far into the last DLC. Had purchased all of them. All but KAamo club will restore. 

ALL my saved games are GONE! Even off my cloud. Assuming its because Kaamo club wont restore. 

Dozens of ships gone.
I literally play this 24/7 5/5 stars

title.label: Best game I’ve ever played on mobile

content.label:
Seriously I’ve put over 1000 hours into this game across many devices and even though I’ve played the story several times and both DLCs several times it never gets old. I’ve been playing for years and it’s still a blast. 
Specter gang 🤙

Also there is a wikia page for this game that was active. I’m an admin there you should check it out.
For lovers of Freelancer

This game is AMAZING. Phone games get a bad reputation for being cheap, have lots of ads, and being pay to win. This games blows everything out of the water and is better than even pc games of a similar genre. No ads and no pay to win. They make the base game so much fun that you want to buy the dlc which is completely optional. The money I spent on this game was more worth than the rest of the phone games I bought combined. If you haven’t played this gem, you must try it out. I’m playing through now on my 4th character because it’s just that much love and detail was put into the game.
Exactly what I want in a space adventure.

Fly around in your space ship. Mine asteroids, pick up side jobs in the lounge, shoot down pirates, or maybe even become one yourself.
The graphics are great, the game play is easy. The storyline is loose enough to where you can make it your own game without really being tied down by it.
I love this game.
Great game and have enjoyed playing it several times. Best Space game I have played thus far.
